attributes.description:
Service Plan: 5 Year / 60 000km Road Side Assistance: 5 Years Unlimited Warranty: 5 Year / 150 000km Engine Warranty: 1 Million Km / 10 Years. 

Features:
Black Roof,
Factory Fitted Immobiliser & Alarm, 
2 Front, 2 Front Side & 2 Curtain Airbags (6), 
Rear Doors (2) Mechanical Child Safety Locks, 
Second Row Isofix Seat Tethers, 
Central Locking, Rear PDCs, 
Rear View Reverse Camera, 
Speed Limit Reminder With Speed Setting Function, 
Tyre Pressure Monitoring System, 
Electronic Brakeforce Distribution, 
Brake Assist System, 
Electronic Stability Program, 
Hill Start Assist, 
Hill Decent Control, 
Blind Spot Detection, 
Door Open Warning, 
Rear Traffic Alert, 
Lane Departure Warning, 
Front Collision Warning, 
Automatic Emergency Braking, 
360 Degree All Round View Monitor, 
Door Ajar Warning, 
Keyless Entry (Remote Start / Stop), 
Remote Carlock & Window Close, 
Speed Sensitive Electric Power Steering, 
Driving Modes (Standard, Eco, Sports), 
Dynamic Adjustable Steering Modes (Eco, Sport), 
Cruise Control (Adaptive On Executive), 
Electrically Adjustable Exterior Mirrors With Integrated Indicators, 
Electrically Foldable & Heated Exterior Mirrors, 
Powered Panoramic Sunroof, 
Automatic Lighting (Activation), 
LED Headlights (With Levelling) And Tailights, 
LED Daytime Running Lights And Fog Lights (Front And Rear), LED Centre High Mounted Brake light. 
Factory Fitted Alarm, 
2 Front, 
2 Front Side & 2 Curtain Airbags (6), 
Rear Doors (2) Mechanical Child Safety Locks,

The Chery Tiggo 7 Pro is an appealing offer. This SUV has a muscular stance that is complemented by sculpted bodywork, so there’s no mistaking it for anything else. Equipped with an intelligent voice assistant, your Tiggo is ready to make your drive more pleasant by completing mundane tasks for you so your focus can stay on the road.

Nationwide delivery.
T&Cs
E & OE
